css: .cover-schnelle-dienstleistungen-section { padding: 6rem 0; } .container { max-width: 1200px; margin: 0 auto; display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr; gap: 3rem; align-items: center; } @media (min-width: 992px) { .container { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; } } .content-side { max-width: 500px; } .pre-title { font-size: 0.8rem; font-weight: 600; color: var(--color-secondary); margin-bottom: 1rem; } h1 { font-size: clamp(2.5rem, 5vw, 3rem); font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 1.5rem; line-height: 1.2; } .content-side p { margin-bottom: 2rem; } .cta-group { display: flex; gap: 1rem; } .btn { padding: 0.8rem 1.5rem; border-radius: 0.5rem; font-weight: 600; text-decoration: none; } .btn-dark { background-color: var(--color-dark); color: var(--color-light); } .btn-light { background-color: #f3f4f6; color: var(--color-dark); } .cards-side { display: grid; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; gap: 1.5rem; } .card { background-color: #f3f4f6; border-radius: 1.5rem; padding: 2rem; } .avatars { display: flex; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .avatars img { width: 40px; height: 40px; border-radius: 50%; border: 2px solid #f3f4f6; margin-left: -12px; } .stars { font-size: 1.5rem; color: #f59e0b; margin-bottom: 1rem; } .rating-card h3 { font-size: 1.2rem; font-weight: 700; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; } .rating-card p { font-size: 0.9rem; color: var(--color-secondary); margin: 0; }

de.name: Schnelle Dienstleistungen
de.title: Deine Dienstleistungen, die deinem Unternehmen helfen, schneller voranzukommen.
de.subtitle: Ein Bento-Raster, anpassbar für Ihre Bedürfnisse.

en.name: Fast Services
en.title: Your services that help your business move faster.
en.subtitle: A bento grid, customizable for your needs.

ar.name: خدمات سريعة
ar.title: خدماتك التي تساعد عملك على التحرك بشكل أسرع.
ar.subtitle: شبكة بنتو قابلة للتخصيص لاحتياجاتك.
